name: Purple Worm
description:
You are the dreaded purple worm. You just found a town full of tasty humans. What more must I say?

Move underground with the arrow keys, watch which way the villagers will run, and press space to surface and chomp. Just be wary of appearing near meddling adventurers....

*Note: This was my first final project for my game dev minor. It was not playtested and I can no longer edit it, and thus is stupid hard until you figure out the AI algorithm. Good luck.
